entries: Being {@condition Prone|XPHB} does not impose disadvantage on the <name>'s ranged weapon attacks.
{@atkr rw} <hit_default>, range 150/300 ft., one target <dmg_strong> bludgeoning or piercing damage.
{@atkr mw} <hit_default>, reach 5 ft., one_target <dmg_puny> piercing damage.

The <name> choses a 20-foot cube centred on a point it can see within 120 feet. Each time a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the <name> can take a Ranged Weapon attack against the creature. The attack does not require a reaction, however, the <name> must be able to see the creature and must not be {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}.
The effects last until the start of the <name>'s next turn and end early once it makes three attacks in this way.

If the <name> has not moved on the current turn it can gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next ranged weapon attack roll it makes before the start of its next turn. On a hit, the attack deals an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) damage.
When it uses this bonus action, the <name>'s speed is reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.
